name: next-simple-google-analytics
description: Add Google Analytics to your Next.js site in a jiffy
author: Tiaan du Plessis <tiaanduplessis@hotmail.com>

scripts.build: microbundle -o dist/ --sourcemap false --compress false --jsx React.createElement --format cjs
scripts.dev: microbundle watch -o dist/ --sourcemap false --compress false --jsx React.createElement --format cjs
